page.title: 12MARKET RASEN-SPORT
page.content: There has always been many facilities for sport in the area but these have been boosted by the opening of the De Aston Sports Centre. This provides opportunities for many indoor games for all ages. There are many thriving clubs many with their own facilities. The rugby club with its ground near De Aston school run 4 xv's;thefootball club run 2 teams and share Rase Park with the cricket club,2 teams, and the snooker club. These clubs also have social facilities too. The tennis club and the bowls club have their own playing areas. All these clubs have had good support for many years as have the badminton clubs. There is also an 18 hole golf- course just outside the town which has a large membership in- cluding many people out of the im- mediate area.
